lines.text: Got spooked and started running around, bumped into the wizard, made him drop the candle?
So you say! But how do we know you weren't tied up after you started the fire?
A-HA! We've got you on the ropes now!
Doesn't seem like anyone was in any shape to tie the goat up, after whatever happened in-
I mean- wait. Quit talkin' to animals!
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Oh, I'll get you yet, you little bearded menace...!</f>
